entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING, Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:32 p.m. EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Blizzard. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Blizzard developing this morning. Wind east 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 50 gusting to 80 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
